content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. I see you may need plumbing help. Can I get your name to start scheduling an appointment?
Nice to meet you, Mike! Could you provide the address where the plumbing service would be needed?
Thanks, Mike. Just checking our coverage... Yes, we service Springfield and the Maple St area. When would be a good time for you to have a technician come by?
I think I'll try fixing it myself this time, so I wonâ€™t need an appointment. Thanks though.
reason: Customer decided to try self-repair, declined scheduling
